Blog.post: phew wat a day...first day of skool got hw already...man...dis sucks...but wat to do...might as well do it rite...got to see my frens and it was fn to see them again...early morning already start laughing out head off...haha..i went to skool to darn early...hahaha...nobody was there and the skool was darn dull...ahhahaa...sian sian sian sian...well..i need to do my work...shit skool...

weeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee..............skool reopening and it gonna be such a boring day...hehehe...at least i can study...man..havent done my hw yet...but i manage to finish some....phew...anyhoo...cant wait to get back to skool..see frens,see fights and see stuff tat shouldnt be seen...hehehe...ok c ya

Megadeth 1.dread and the fugitive mind (mastered dis one) 2.paranoid 3.Peace sells(mastered dis one) 4.She-wolf 5.reckoning day Vital Remains 1.The trooper Machine head 1.Imperium Sepultura 1.Roots Bloody Roots

yesterday was cool...i went out wif my cousin and it was the 2 of us...and we went to watch a movie...i was late meeting my cousin...we went to lido to watch a movie...ard the world in 80 days..we tht it was lame but it was damn funny and we had fun , we laugh all the way thru out the movie...hehehehe...den, the day took an unexpected change and a change in my life...my cousin's fren call him and we r going jamming after a few years...WEEEEEEEE...i tht we playing som e easy songs but i was damn wrong...we are abt to play iron maiden and megadeth...i was shocked...i wasnt prepare for anything at all...so we go to jurong point and i prepare for the worse...upon reaching there...i play to the veyr best i can...i lsiten and watch my cousin play, watch my cousin fren younger brother play his bassand try to shadow and fit in..by the time finish...my cousin fren say i was good..n he even ask me to join the band...cool...NOW im learning songs dat is very hard and i master 2 of em already...still got 8 more songs to go..wish me luck

well well well, i finally met my cousin after 4 weeks of hols..he went to germany for hols wif his family and i tell ya...it was cool...even tho im not there...he told me everything abt germany.Especially the metal band there...damn, it seems like germany have metal gigs every week.and most important of all...her bought me a sweat shirt which is the most rarest in singapore coz im the only one who has it...WAHAHAHAHAHA...den...he told me the gothic concept there is very powerful...it seem like everywhere u go there r gothic ppls..cool...i wanna go to germany to see dat...well...dat all

dis is the 3rd blog in a day...im getting used to it and i need some help...my fren , nodds did a good job on her blogger page n i need her help...man...i wanna put in pics but no damn idea...hehehe...wat to do...IM A NOOB...ahhahah ok...i just suck
i dedicate dis song to u all peeps out there damn u , damn u , damn u ,damn u weell..dat the song and thx

hahahaha...life prettyy ok wif me...im sure pretty oki wif life but sometimes we do get to eachother bad side...well..skool gonna reopen soon and hols gonna end...life couldnt be more promising...well let me talk abt my hols but we start on dat ltr on ok... cya
